description: A message describing a grading job to be run.
title: Grading Queue Message

___s3Bucket.description: The AWS S3 bucket containing this job's files.

___timeout.description: The number of seconds after which the grading job will timeout.

___image.description: The image that this job will be executed in.

___jobId.description: The unique ID for this job.

___s3RootKey.description: The root key for th job's files.

___entrypoint.description: The script that will be run to start this job.
